title: Fan, 19th century
medium:
Medium: ivory, paper
Technique: sticks carved and painted, leaf painted
description: Folding fan with ivory sticks carved and painted with flowers in black, gray and white. The paper leaf is painted in black and white gouache. On the obverse, a pastoral scene of two women and a boy in front of a house in a rural landscape, with floral borders. On the reverse, a small sketchy landscape with a house, in black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: ivory, paper
Technique: sticks carved and painted, leaf painted. Gift of Eleanor Garnier Hewitt. 1931-65-165.
